commentBody:
Welcome to the Third World. For generations my family was in the garment manufacturing business in South America, till a Chinese-American-European-Own-Country-Policies Combo obliterated us. Piracy is very common in any country in the Third World, off course no in the size of the China nowadays, but always happened.
Everybody in the poor countries want a piece of the American or the European Dream.
And poor countries, usually are poor, in part, because of their very corrupt governments.
So, you always have the option to move the manufacturing and the Walmarts, and Carrefours back to America and Europe, and stop dealing with this kind of bad, very bad people.
Don't you?
